column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/eaafa23cbd83b7bda4b28779138c62446bbdea2a for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu

Eh, I ran the wrong test_bitcoin. I installed wine 1.7.1 from the winehq PPA on my Ubuntu 12.04 box and it still fails,

```
Running 109 test cases...
util_tests.cpp(338): error in "gettime": check (GetTime() & ~0xFFFFFFFFLL) == 0 failed

*** 1 failure detected in test suite "Bitcoin Test Suite"
```

... I don't get it.

@diapolo thanks for testing
